subject: Class Loader problem?
msgSnippet: Well, I ve messed with this all day now, and I m at a standstill. I m getting a ClassCastException when I run uTest the second time I run my GUI (see Stack
messageBody:
Well, I've messed with this all day now, and I'm at a standstill.
I'm getting a ClassCastException when I run uTest the second time I run my GUI (see Stack Trace below).uTest uses the JUnit framework and also includes a class loader & an exclude list. I have the following packages defined in the exclude list:

java.*
javax.*
junit.*
com.borland.*
com.inprise.*
com.visigenic.*
com.ibm.*
com.sun.*
sun.*
org.omg.*
org.apache.*
org.w3c.dom.*
org.xml.sax.*

===== Begining of Stack Trace =====
java.lang.ClassCastException: com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.lf.PanelToolTipUI
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.PanelToolTip.updateUI(PanelToolTip.java:16)
at javax.swing.JToolTip.<init>(JToolTip.java:64)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.PanelToolTip.<init>(PanelToolTip.java:6)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.GCMCStatusBar$StateLabel.<init>(GCMCStatusBar.java:341)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.GCMCStatusBar$StateLabel.<init>(GCMCStatusBar.java:336)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.GCMCStatusBar.<init>(GCMCStatusBar.java:49)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.views.NEContainerView.<init>(NEContainerView.java:187)
at com.fnc.geni.gui.gcmc.integration.GCMCComponent.initialize(GCMCComponent.java:99)
at com.fnc.geni.apl.ApplicationLaunchMgr.initialize(ApplicationLaunchMgr.java:239)
at com.fnc.geni.apps.repository.RepositoryByTypeTest.setUp(RepositoryByTypeTest.java:41)
at junit.framework.TestCase.runBare(TestCase.java:138)
at junit.framework.TestResult$1.protect(TestResult.java:106)
at junit.framework.TestResult.runProtected(TestResult.java:124)
at junit.framework.TestResult.run(TestResult.java:109)
at junit.framework.TestCase.run(TestCase.java:131)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:173)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:168)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.runTest(TestSuite.java:173)
at junit.framework.TestSuite.run(TestSuite.java:168)
at utest.Runner$1.run(Runner.java:69)
===== End of Stack Trace =====

I'd appreciate any help.

Scott
:-> Change is inevitable except from vending machines.
